Reference

Forward geocoding

Obtain coordinates from addresses

geocode()

Geocode addresses in a dataframe

geo()

Geocode addresses

geocode_combine()

Combine multiple geocoding queries

geo_combine()

Combine multiple geocoding queries

Reverse Geocoding

Obtain addresses from coordinates

reverse_geocode()

Reverse geocode coordinates in a dataframe

reverse_geo()

Reverse geocode coordinates

Deprecated Functions

Use geo() instead
